message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer, and I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we meet at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $105?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob, but I'm confident you'll love this product. I can do $108, which is as high as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can we do $107?
I'm glad we're still in the negotiation, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. How about we meet at $109?
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can we do $106?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make one final adjustment. How about we meet at $110, but this is my last offer?
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time. Can we do $107?
